sources.title: Reform Girl (1933) NOEL FRANCISüçï SKEETS GALLAGHER
sources.description:
üçïFirst Time on YouTubeüçï
PizzaFLIX Presents Classic Movie Monday
Stars: Noel Francis, Skeets Gallagher, Hale Hamilton
Director: Sam Newfield

A hardened young woman is sprung from prison by a dirty politician who intends to cast her in a key role to smear his Senatorial opponent.

TRIVIA: Noel Francis arrived in Tinsel Town loaded with Song & Dance skills. But in this Poverty Row production from 1933, the Texas beauty does what she does best: playing the BAD GIRL. But is she or isn't she?

metadata.Plot: A young girl just out of prison and desperate for money finds herself involved in a plot to smear a politician by pretending to be his long-lost daughter.
metadata.Actors: Noel Francis, Richard 'Skeets' Gallagher, Hale Hamilton
